__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Cellars

pages.text: The $(thing)Cellar$() is a multiblock device controlled by a $(l:firmalife:firmalife/climate_station)Climate Station$(). The Cellar multiblock's only requirement is that it be in an enclosed area surrounded by $(thing)Sealed Bricks$() or $(thing)Sealed Brick Doors$() on all sides. The Climate Station must be placed on the first level of the cellar, touching a wall.

pages.name: An Example Cellar
pages.text: This is just one of many cellars that you could make!
$(thing)Beeswax$() is obtained from $(l:firmalife:firmalife/beekeeping)Beekeeping$().$(br)Cellars are used for $(l:firmalife:firmalife/cheese#aging)Aging Cheese$().
